Function reference

Vector Functions

geom_vector() stat_vector() StatVector GeomVector
Create a Vector Plot Layer
geom_vector2() stat_vector2()
Create a Vector Plot Layer with Norm Mapped to Length

Create a Vector Field Plot Layer
geom_vector_field2() stat_vector_field2()
Create a Vector Field Plot Layer with Length Mapped to Norm

Create a Gradient Field Plot Layer
geom_gradient_field2() stat_gradient_field2()
Create a Gradient Field Plot Layer with Length Mapped to Norm
scale_length_continuous()
Create a Continuous Scale for Vector Length

Create a Flow Plot Geom Layer
geom_streamplot() stat_streamplot()
Create a Stream Plot Geom Layer

ggvfields ggvfields-package
ggvfields: Vector Field Visualizations with ggplot2
animation_transition()
Transition a streamplot to an animation ready object
